Description:
Detects when an internet hosted webdav share is mounted using the "net.exe" utility

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Internet Hosted WebDav Share Mount Via Net.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\net.exe' or process_path like '%\net1.exe') and (original_file_name = 'net.exe' or original_file_name = 'net1.exe')) and (command like '% use %' and command like '% http%'))
